get.description:
Call to doglib.fetch(), supports PID and list of PIDs in formats:
?pid=<pid1>&pid=<pid2>&pid=<pid3>
?pid=<pid1>,<pid2>,<pid3>

Returns [{<pid>: {fetch_results}}]

schema.title: Fetch response schema
schema.description: Schema of the response of doglib.fetch() call

400.description: Persistent Identifier(s) {pids} is either not correct or has been not recognised

get.description:
Call to doglib.fetch(), supports PID and list of PIDs in formats:
?pid=<pid1>&pid=<pid2>&pid=<pid3>
?pid=<pid1>,<pid2>,<pid3>

Returns [{<pid>: {identify_result}}]

schema.title: Identify response schema
schema.description: Schema of the response of doglib.identify() call

400.description: Persistent Identifier(s) {pids} is either not correct or has been not recognised

get.summary: Call to doglib.sniff(), supports list of parameters in format ?pid=<pid1>&pid=<pid2>&pid=<pid3>

schema.title: Identify response schema
schema.description: Schema of the response of doglib.identify() call
